thongtin: After giving birth to their first child, the couple decided to have another child next year
The oldest brother hates the second brother because he feels that his parents no longer love him
Husband was shocked when he found out that his second child was a neighbor's child.
In order to fight for the inheritance, the two brothers' families cut off ties with each other
In order for her second son to study abroad, the mother forced her first son to drop out of school and work part-time to earn money
The husband wanted to have a second child but found out that he was infertile
At the age of 24, the second son discovered that he was the biological son of a tycoon family
The wife feels angry because her husband forced her to have a second child because the family is too poor
In order for the second son to live, the eldest decided to donate a liver
Husband still leaves his wife to follow his mistress even though they are two people with two small children
The mother always beat and scolded the eldest son because she thought he was the one who killed the son
The mother was surprised when her ugly second child also got married.
She passed away after giving birth to her second child.
In order to marry into a rich family, the younger sister severed ties with her first twin sister
The whole family had to go to the street to live because of the gambling debt.
The second daughter married a poor man, making the eldest sister jealous because she was loved by her husband.
Her husband's family promised her a big villa after she gave birth to her second baby, but when she gave birth to the baby, her husband's family became beggars because her husband played cards.
They went to the doctor and said their second baby would be a girl, they prepared clothes for a girl, but when the doctor took it out, it was a boy.
She married early, she was only 20 years old and gave birth to a second child.
The boy was surprised to see his wife's small belly, after a natural stomachache she gave birth to the second princess of the family.
The father was shocked to see his son say Hello old man when he was only 5 months old.
The girl was pregnant with the second child, she was in labor pain and was on the operating table for 2 minutes, she gave birth to a healthy baby.
He has been bald since his wife gave birth to their second child because during labor his wife grabbed his hair.

The husband came home to find his wife had a stomachache. Ask your wife if she's okay. The wife said she was giving birth to a second child. The husband was shocked because his first child was only three months old. His wife laughed and joked, just ate a lot.
The girl was shocked when her second child was born a girl because before going to the doctor, she told her to give birth to a boy.
